options.2: Yes, I'm human being, and you?
options.3: That's not important, but yes, I'm human being.

dialogue_2.text: Aida: I'm diane, we are very pacific alien race, though once we had to defend us because graylien attacks to our planet…

options.4: You were at war with another alien race?
options.5: Oh, that's sound very bad, and why did they attack you?

dialogue_3.text: Aida: Oh, then you're part of our ancestors, you originated us!

options.6: Really?! Wow! I would never imaginated that!
options.7: Oh, interesting, and tell me what are your hobbies?

dialogue_4.text: Aida: Yes, many of us died in that war, it was so terrible!

options.8: I'm so sorry for you, you must have suffered a lot…
options.9: And someone of your family died in that war?

dialogue_5.text: Aida: They attacked us by their ambition of natural resources and their hate for us…

options.13: You don't know how sorry I am, it's a horrible feeling
options.10: Why your natural resources are so valious?

dialogue_6.text: Aida: Yes, it's true! I've a question for you, what's your name?

options.11: My name is Markus, and your name?

dialogue_7.text: Aida: I really like to draw pictures, eat and play role playing games, and your hobbies?

options.12: I like to play chess and video games, draw and hear music.
options.14: I see you have many hobbies in common with me, because I like to draw too!

dialogue_8.text: Aida: Oh, yes, I suffered a lot… My father died there, when he was fighting against some graylien soldiers… Do you wanna go to my home now?

dialogue_9.text: Aida: Yes, my father died there, when he was fighting against some graylien soldiers.

options.17: Well, do you wanna talk about another issue?
options.13: I'm so sorry, really I have too sadness for what you lived through

dialogue_10.text: Aida: They're very valious because they can be sold for a lot of money.

options.18: Wow! It's interesting, though for nothing in the world would I do what they did.
options.19: Well, that's very interesting but do you wanna something to eat or aren't you hungry?

dialogue_11.text: Aida: Oh, your name is very beautiful, just in case, my name is Aida.

options.20: I love your name! It's beautiful!
options.21: I had never heard that name, but it's very nice!

dialogue_12.text: Aida: Oh, I really like same that, but I don't know chess, what is it?

options.23: Chess is a board and strategy game created by humans, in which your goal is to checkmate your opponent.
options.24: Oh, it's a long issue, it would be better to talk about it later.

dialogue_13.text: Aida: Don't worry, maybe I'm overcome it...

options.25: I'm happy for you, it's good that you were able to overcome that
